plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💚 I'm the color of a frog!
🐄 Animals eat me!
🌱 I grow outside!

plant.question: I am red, round, and grow on a plant. You can eat me!

hints.text: 🔴 I am a yummy color!
🪴 I grow on a vine!
🍕 Sometimes I am put on pizza!

plant.question: I have petals and smell nice. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I can be many colors!
🐝 Bees come to visit me!
👃 You can give me as a gift!

plant.question: I am tall and have a strong trunk. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am made of wood!
🍁 I have leaves that change colors!
🌳 I am very big!

plant.question: I am long and orange and you can eat me as a snack. Rabbits love me!

hints.text: 🥕 I'm a yummy snack!
🐰 Bunnies love to eat me!
💪 Eating me can help you see in the dark!

plant.question: I have thorns and smell good. People give me to show love. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 I can be red!
🖐️ Be careful of my prickly parts!
❤️ People give me to someone they love!

plant.question: I am a big fruit with a green rind and red inside. I am very juicy!

hints.text: 🍉 I am a summer fruit!
⚫️ I have black seeds!
⛱️ You can find me at a picnic!

plant.question: I grow underground and have a brown skin. You can make french fries out of me!

hints.text: 🥔 I grow under the dirt!
🍟 You can make fries out of me!
🍚 People eat me with meat, rice, or vegetables!

plant.question: I am a tall plant that has yellow corn on it. You can pop my kernels!

hints.text: 🌽 I grow very tall in a field!
🍿 You can pop me and eat me at the movies!
💛 My kernels are yellow!

plant.question: I have a spiky shell and grow on a tree. Monkeys love to eat me.

hints.text: 🌰 Animals collect me for the winter.
🐒 Monkeys like to crack me open.
🌳 I fall from the tree.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. I help flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and round.
🔥 I am very hot.
☀️ You can see me when you wake up in the morning.

cosmos.question: I am round and I go around the Sun. You live here! What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I have lots of water.
🌱 You can grow plants here.
🏠 This is where your house is!

cosmos.question: I twinkle at night, far, far away. Sometimes you can make a wish on me! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am shiny and small.
🌌 There are many of me in the sky.
🔭 You need a telescope to see me better.

cosmos.question: I change my shape, and sometimes I'm full and bright. I come out at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I look like a circle.
🐺 Werewolves like me a lot!
🌑 Sometimes you can't see me at all.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas, much bigger than Earth, and I have a red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am a planet
🔴 I have a famous storm
🪐 I am the largest planet in our solar system

cosmos.question: I have rings around me, made of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very pretty.
🪐 I am a planet with many moons.
🥶 I am very cold.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some look like animals.
✨ People use lines to connect me
📜 They have been named since ancient times

cosmos.question: I am very, very far away and have many, many stars, dust and gas. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I can be spiral or elliptical.
🌌 The Milky Way is one of me.
✨ I am bigger than solar system.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of fire, much bigger and hotter than the sun, very far away. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I give off a lot of light and heat.
✨ I am at the center of many solar systems
🔭 You need a strong telescope to see some.

cosmos.question: I am a fast moving object made of ice and dust that sometimes has a tail. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I come from the outer solar system.
❄️ I am sometimes called a 'dirty snowball'
☀️ When I get closer to the sun, I get a tail.
